text: As part of financial services, we sort
of solve customer problems across different

areas in capital markets,
banking and in insurance.

I think the biggest area that
we would be focused on along

with AWS, is going to be
on how to make people

increase the consumption
that they have committed
across different tiers.

How do you migrate these
workloads to the cloud?

What's the best way to make
them move as efficiently
and as quickly as possible?

We've started building FS
ambassadors for the people

who will lead this change
for various customers,

give them the comfort
that they're going to move
workloads in a very safe, secure manner
that is going to enhance business value.
These ambassadors are going to be part

of the well architected
program that AWS has.

We work jointly with
AWS in building teams,

in building centers of
excellence, in building the right
trained people who can be, you know,
at the customer sites in fairly- and
and implement these things fairly quickly.
We used Amazon Connect.

The results of that have already
been extremely gratifying.

The customer experience has
improved significantly across
the desks, and this is something
that I think has a huge opportunity
for various organizations to implement.
